videos.description: ESPN Steelers reporter Jeremy Fowler says that despite being transported out of the tunnel in a golf cart, quarterback Ben Roethlisberger says he'll be ready to play against the Chiefs next Sunday.

videos.description: Le'Veon Bell, Antonio Brown and Ben Roethlisberger all made the most of their first postseason game together for the Steelers in a win over the Dolphins.
